thread.title: The futuristic plan for building navy vessels
thread.title_full: The futuristic plan for building navy vessels

title: The futuristic plan for building navy vessels
text:
Navies could harness 3D-printing to build military vessels, report says JAMES ROGERS Fox News Navies could harness 3D-printing to build military vessels, report says JAMES ROGERS Fox News This could be 3D-printed soon. 
NAVIES around the world could harness 3D-printing to build hi-tech military vessels over the next 15 years, according to a report released on Monday by defence contractor Qinetiq. 
The Global Marine Technology Trends 2030 report, produced with Lloydâ€™s Register and the University of Southampton in the U.K, highlights the potential military uses of advanced technologies and materials. 
A spokesman for Qinetiq told FoxNews.com that naval personnel on board ships, for example, could use 3D printing to create small vessels from layers of metal and plastic powder. Other Stories
